features.title2: Let our AI do your job
features.content1: Either choose from our suggested keywords or type your own.
features.content2: It will generate your skill test questions for you to get started.
features.content3: Customize your skill test questions to suit your needs.
features.content4: Share links on job posts or directly  with your candidates.

section2.subtitle: Create your own
section2.title: Create Your Own AI Skill Test

section3.subtitle: Skill Test Libraries
section3.title: Explore premade skill tests to instantly get started.

section4.subtitle: My Skill Test
section4.title: What I have created so far

banner.subtitle: Why Redrob?
banner.cont1: Creating an skill test to deployment takes less
banner.cont2: than 30 seconds. Just give it a try!

section.title: Delete Section
section.content: Are you sure you want to delete this section? All the questions inside the category will be deleted, and this action cannot be undone.

question.title: Delete Question
question.content: Are you sure you want to delete this question? This action cannot be undone.

titleInput.label: Title
titleInput.placeholder: Enter your skill test setting here..

instruction.label: Instruction
instruction.placeholder: Describe what your candidates have to do/know beforehand.

visibility.label: Skill Test visibility
visibility.content: You can set the visibility of the skill test.

delete.label: Delete Test
delete.content: Warning: This action is not recoverable. Please double-check if you want to proceed with this action.

domain.label: Email domain restriction
domain.content: If specified, only the users with this email domain will have access to this test.

publish.label: Publish Date
publish.content: This test will be ‘Open’ automatically after publish date

closing.label: Closing Date
closing.content: This test will be ‘Closed’ automatically after closing date

time_limit.label: Time Limit
time_limit.content: You can set the skill test time limit.

list.cont1: Click one of the pre-made templates without having to start from scratch!

templates.cont1: Browse through the pre-made templates and choose the one you would like to use!

createnew.title: Create New
createnew.leftTitle2: Don't See What You Are Looking For? Type Instead
createnew.rightCont1: Select a job position title from the list and our AI will create skill test questions based on other companies' popular choices.
createnew.rightCont2: If the popular keywords do not suit your needs, you can type your desired job position just like many other companies do!

loading.title: Your Skill Test is Being Generated
loading.body: Please wait. It may take up to 60 seconds

open.title: Open Skill Test
open.content: Are you sure you want to open this skill test? You can close the skill test at anytime.

close.title: Close Skill Test
close.content: Are you sure you want to close this skill test? You can reopen the skill test at any time.

delete.title: Delete Test
delete.content: Are you sure you want to delete this skill test?
